idCVar g_voteFlags("g_voteFlags","0", CVAR_GAME|CVAR_NETWORKSYNC|CVAR_INTEGER|CVAR_ARCHIVE,"vote flags. bit mask of votes not allowed on this server
""bit 0 (+1) restart now
""bit 1 (+2) time limit
""bit 2 (+4) frag limit
""bit 3 (+8) game type
""bit 4 (+16) kick player
""bit 5 (+32) change map
""bit 6 (+64) spectators
""bit 7 (+128) next map")
